header.value: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, PATCH, OPTIONS

query.description: (Optional, Integer) Sets the maximum number of items to show on one page.
(Optional, Integer) Number of the element from which the list is generated (the count starts from 0).
(Optional, String) The two-letter code that sets the response language (like 'en' for English). If not given, the project's default language is used.
(Optional, String) The two-letter code that sets the country for prices and rules. If not given, the project's default country is used.
(Optional, String) The currency of the prices being requested.
